home.title: Foster Care in Ontario | Annie's Havens
home.description: Becoming a foster parent in Ontario can be confusing. There are many options. Annie's Havens has been providing foster care services since 1996.
home.keywords: foster care,foster care ontario,foster care programs,foster parents,Annie's Havens

metaTags.content: Foster Care in Ontario | Annie's Havens
Becoming a foster parent in Ontario can be confusing. There are many options. Annie's Havens has been providing foster care services since 1996.

aboutUs.title: About Our Foster Care Agency | Annie's Havens
aboutUs.description: Annie's Havens provides foster care in Ontario through our qualified and caring foster homes. We are licensed by the Government of Ontario.
aboutUs.keywords: foster care,foster care ontario,private foster care,about us,foster care agency,Annie's Havens

metaTags.content: About Our Foster Care Agency | Annie's Havens
Annie's Havens provides foster care in Ontario through our qualified and caring foster homes. We are licensed by the Government of Ontario.

carePrograms.title: Foster Care Programs | Annie's Havens
carePrograms.description: Kids come into foster care with all types of needs. Annie's Havens has different care programs tailored to the different supports that may be needed.
carePrograms.keywords: foster care programs,special needs foster care,trauma focused foster care,trauma foster care,regular foster care,foster care Ontario,Annie's Havens

metaTags.content: Kids come into foster care with all types of needs. Annie's Havens has different care programs tailored to the different supports that may be needed.

referralSources.title: Foster Care Referral Sources | Annie's Havens
referralSources.description: We accept foster children from many parts of southern Ontario. Our foster homes benefit from our many referral sources (Children's Aid Societies).
referralSources.keywords: foster care,foster care referrals,foster care placements,foster care Ontario,Annie's Havens

metaTags.content: We accept foster children from many parts of southern Ontario. Our foster homes benefit from our many referral sources (Children's Aid Societies).

serviceArea.title: Foster Home Service Area | Annie's Havens
serviceArea.description: Our foster homes cover a large area of southen Ontario. We are able to open homes in most areas of the GTA and surrounding regions.
serviceArea.keywords: foster care Ontario,GTA foster care,Toronto foster care,foster homes Ontario,becoming a foster parent,Annie's Havens

metaTags.content: Foster Home Service Area | Annie's Havens
Our foster homes cover a large area of southen Ontario. We are able to open homes in most areas of the GTA and surrounding regions.

fosterParentApplicationProcess.title: Foster Parent Application Proccess in Ontario | Annie's Havens
fosterParentApplicationProcess.shortTitle: Foster Parent Application Process in Ontario
fosterParentApplicationProcess.description: Applying to become a foster parent in Ontario is simple. Make a call to 1 (866) 321-2137 ext. 956. Learn more about the application process with Annie's Havens.
